title: What happened to Lines & Splines?
content:
I've been out of the type scene for a while, does anyone know where the Lines & Splines site went? Did Andy just give it up or what?

 [‹ Suitcase Vs Font Reserve - in Panther](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060135/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3535 "Go to previous forum topic") [Disney Signage Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060135/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3533 "Go to next forum topic")
author: matt_desmond

comments.content: It went away and became [www.new-series.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060135/http:/www.new-series.org/), which hasn't been updated in over a year.
